title: Disposal, Yard, Oven, Easy Access to I-25
posting_body: ['Riviera Apartments', '950 W. 103rd PL, Northglenn, CO, 80260', 'Use this link for more information:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Deposit Free Community', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 580 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'We offer one and two bedroom apartments ready to be called home.', 'Our pet-friendly apartments have a wonderful pool area and basketball court.', 'Centrally located just 15 minutes from downtown Denver, you really can be in the middle of everything at Riviera!', 'Features', '- Lawn', '- Yard', '- High Speed Internet Access', '- Large Bedrooms', '- Range', '- Air Conditioning', '- Carpet', '- Hardwood-Like Plank Floors', '- Refrigerator', '- Dishwasher', '- Washer/Dryer -', 'In Unit', '- Granite Countertops', '- Oven', '- Window Coverings', '- Patio', '- Disposal', '- Stainless Steel Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Swimming Pool', '- Affordable 1 and 2 Bedrooms', '- Under A New Management', '- 15 minutes from Downtown', '- Easy Access to I-25', '- On RTD bus line', '- Near restaurants and shopping', '- Pets welcome', '- basketball court', '- Newly Renovated Units', '- Professional On-Site Management', '- Library', 'Near By', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Maximum of two (2) pets allowed!', 'Breed restrictions apply.', 'Income Requirements:', '2.5 times the rent.', 'The monthly rent of the apartment being rented is the minimum gross verifiable income required for the household.', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'gKDhLAsZ2']
